<br>

Hello! I’m **Kostadin Kostadinov** – a medical doctor and researcher in the department of Social Medicine and Public Health, Plovdiv, Bulgaria. I’m passionate about exploring the intersections of health and society, with a particular emphasis on the impact of social determinants on public health outcomes. I have a strong background in internal medicine, epidemiology, heath policy and economics. I love data analysis and statistical methods, primarily using R and Python for data analysis. I’m also passionate about teaching and advocating for open-source tools in academia.
